item.title: Lachlan Murdoch Says Family Trust Settlement Is “Great News for Investors”
item.description: The Fox Corp. CEO says the deal will ensure that the company’s strategy is “clear” and “sustainable.”

item.title: Who Is the Audience For Fox’s New Streamer? They’re Not Exactly Sure Yet
item.description: Fox is launching a new streaming service Thursday that it hopes does not cannibalize its cable numbers, but reaches other sports and news fans.

item.title: Fox Ad Revenue Rises, Driven by Tubi and Fox News
item.description: The company saw revenues rise across the board in tis fiscal Q4 quarter, as it prepares to launch its Fox One streaming service.
